name: Battle Stations
overview: Compilation of three loosely based arcade machines, Typhoon, Operation Wolf and Guerrilla. All are kind of fighting against a despot dictator, and have various forces trying to depose them. Typhoon is a vertically scrolling shoot em up, using helicopters and planes to take the fight to the enemy Operation Wolf is a first person shooter in the arcades, where there is mounted Uzi machine guns to fire at the enemy, in the home conversions it is with the use of the cursor. Guerrilla has the player infiltrating jungle terrain to rescue hostages.
